input_text:
Job Title: Housekeeper (Part Time)

Location: Williamsburg, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description:
Do you take PRIDE in what you do?
Apply today to Williamsburg Landing where employees lead with: Passion, Respect, Integrity, Diversity & Excellence
HOUSEKEEPER
Williamsburg Landing, a CARF-accredited Life Plan Community, seeks a Part-Time Housekeeper to join our Housekeeping Team. The ideal candidate must show initiative and good judgement and maintain positive interactions with residents, guests, and staff.
Starting pay rate is $15.50/hr and is commensurate with experience.
Hours range between 7am-4pm M-F, 6am-2:30pm on Saturday/Sunday. One weekend a month is required.
HOUSEKEEPER JOB DUTIES:Maintains facilities in safe, sanitary, and infection-free conditions by cleaning and disinfecting areas as established by cleaning procedures, guidelines, and checklistsFollows cleaning schedule (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.) as outlined; operates various mechanized cleaning equipment such as vacuums, etc.Cleans floors utilizing dry mops, wet mops, brooms, and disinfectants; performs emergency housekeeping when accidents occurCleans movable and stationary furnishings and fixtures; dusts, spot cleans, or washes, disinfects when necessary, polishes where required including cleaning ledges, handrails, shelves, vents, etc.; empties, cleans, and relines wastebaskets and trashcansCleans and disinfects bathrooms including all fixtures, floors, and walls; washes windows and mirrors; replenishes bathroom suppliesCleans and disinfects kitchens including all surfaces and fixtures, cabinet doors, refrigerators, stove tops, and ovensCleans walls, windows, doors, and ceilingsCleans entrances and exits, trash rooms and utility roomsPerforms laundry duties following all state and federal regulations
HOUSEKEEPER QUALIFICATIONS:Any satisfactory combination of education, training, experience, or abilities in a related fieldAbility to communicate and follow instructions in English, verbally and in writingAbility to lift 50 pounds, stretch arms above head, bend to clean under furniture, climb stairs & step ladders, and reach overhead with frequency
BENEFITS (Full-Time Employees):Health, Dental & Vision InsuranceFSA & HSA403(b) Retirement Plan*529 College Savings Plan*Long-Term Care InsuranceLegal ResourcesPaid Time OffHoliday Pay*Corporate Wellness Program*Health Club & Spa Membership*Employee Education & Training Fund*Employee Assistance ProgramCredit Union Membership*
* Part Time employee eligible
Williamsburg Landing is a non-profit, independent community offering a vibrant lifestyle for residents.
Apply online at Williamsburglanding.org.
EOE/Drug Free/Tobacco Free
Requirements:
 
PI239175404

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Housekeeper (Part Time)
output_json.summary: Part-Time Housekeeper position at Williamsburg Landing, a CARF-accredited Life Plan Community.
job_responsibilities: Maintains facilities in safe, sanitary, and infection-free conditions by cleaning and disinfecting areas as established by cleaning procedures, guidelines, and checklists
Follows cleaning schedule (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.) as outlined; operates various mechanized cleaning equipment such as vacuums, etc.
Cleans floors utilizing dry mops, wet mops, brooms, and disinfectants; performs emergency housekeeping when accidents occur
Cleans movable and stationary furnishings and fixtures; dusts, spot cleans, or washes, disinfects when necessary, polishes where required including cleaning ledges, handrails, shelves, vents, etc.
Empties, cleans, and relines wastebaskets and trashcans
Cleans and disinfects bathrooms including all fixtures, floors, and walls; washes windows and mirrors; replenishes bathroom supplies
Cleans kitchens including all surfaces and fixtures, cabinet doors, refrigerators, stove tops, and ovens
Cleans walls, windows, doors, and ceilings
Cleans entrances and exits, trash rooms, and utility rooms
Performs laundry duties following all state and federal regulations
output_json.physical_requirements: Ability to lift 50 pounds, stretch arms above head, bend to clean under furniture, climb stairs & step ladders, and reach overhead with frequency
output_json.company_information: Williamsburg Landing is a non-profit, independent community offering a vibrant lifestyle for residents.
